agent_output_excerpt:
**v0.7 is complete.** All 8 checklist items are checked off.

## Iteration #25 Summary

**Changes made:**
- **pyproject.toml**: Fixed packaging for PyPI distribution — added `domain/`, `modules/`, `adapters/` to wheel packages, force-included `wiring.py`, updated version to `0.7.0`, added PyPI classifiers and project URL, renamed package to `anima-engine` (avoids PyPI name conflicts)
- **roadmap/v0.7.md**: Checked off 4 remaining items — all were either already implemented or completed in this iteration

**Verification:** `ruff check . && ruff format --check . && pyright && pytest --cov --cov-fail-under=80` — all pass, 99.5% coverage.

**Status:** v0.7 complete. Anima is ready for v0.8 (Self-Validation & Benchmark).
